job_history.work_description: Delivered administrative and operations support to Corporate Institutional Bank Insurance team, including 10+ senior relationship managers and 5 credit analysts while managing day-to-day reception activities such as greeting visitors and vendors, and responding to requests for information. Coordinated executive and senior management's schedules, calendars, and agendas, and drafted meeting agendas and followed up on meetings and team conferences. Worked with administrative team members and human resources staff during new employee hiring and special events. Produced reports and correspondence, administered up-to-date organizational chart, maintained office activity logs and spreadsheets, and distributed incoming mail throughout office.
Past experience includes Administrative Word Processing Specialist in Trust and Investment Services.

Provided comprehensive administrative and operational support to five-person team comprised of commercial lending officers, relationship management team, and loan operations team, ensuring delivery of best-in-class customer service. Enforced compliance with lending requirements relating to origination, processing, closing, and funding commercial loans, ensured adherence to federal and state regulatory guidelines, upheld bank policies, procedures, and standards; maintained knowledge of Patriot Act (CIP), Bank Secrecy Act, and Community Reinvestment Act.

skills.name: Administrative Support
skills.explanation: Over 25 years of experience in providing administrative support to various teams, including corporate institutional bank insurance, commercial lending, and trust and investment services, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Provided operational support to multiple teams, ensuring delivery of best-in-class customer service, and enforced compliance with lending requirements, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance Management
skills.explanation: Ensured adherence to federal and state regulatory guidelines, upheld bank policies, procedures, and standards, and maintained knowledge of relevant acts, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided comprehensive administrative and operational support to teams, ensuring delivery of best-in-class customer service, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated executive and senior management's schedules, calendars, and agendas, and drafted meeting agendas, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Responded to requests for information, drafted meeting agendas, and followed up on meetings and team conferences, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for producing reports, correspondence, and maintaining office activity logs and spreadsheets, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided support to teams, but did not have direct leadership roles, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.
